Title: Chapter 8
Writer: Noah Hawley, Noah Hawley (created by), Chris Claremont (based on the Marvel comics by), Bill Sienkiewicz (based on the Marvel comics by), Ryan O'Nan (staff writer)
Actors: Dan Stevens, Rachel Keller, Aubrey Plaza, Bill Irwin
Plot: The Interrogator goes after David for revenge but has a surprise waiting. Division 3 is observing the turn of events. Cary devises a new experiment to separate the monster from David, but things do not go as planned.
